articles.description: Itel P55 5G was launched in India on Tuesday and is claimed to be the cheapest 5G smartphone in the country. The phone is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity chipset and supports wired fast charging. Meanwhile, another budget handset, Itel S23+ was als…
